name: Glitch Yard
description:
2D - Tower defense game, based on a Udemy course
https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/ - Glitch Garden

My main goal here is to get as much as I can from the provided assets and focus on level design.
The followings are added:
✓ health bars
✓ animations
✓ random damage ranges
✓ floating damage numbers
✓ boss fights
✓ multiple waves
✓ sell towers

CONTROLS:
M1 - select tower
M1 - place tower
M2 - sell tower
